mapinfo.detailsText: The mystical Shangra La, cross the mountains for more resources.
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: All players start on the snowy Tibetan Plateau to the east side of a high mountain range, each with a single silver mine and limited local resources. Find the few passes through the mountains to the fabled lost valley of Shangra La, where a trade route, gold, treasures and plentiful other extra resources await.\n \nMap by RF_Gandalf
